attributes.action: To revisit the cannabis classification and public Heath 2008
attributes.additional_details: The latest evidence from the independent Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs is that the use of cannabis is a significant public health issue (‘Cannabis Classification and Public Health’, 2008).
attributes.background: The statement made by the independent advisory council made 7 years ago is out of date and need to be revisited to meet up with new evidence founded after then

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106724

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
